Trustee_19_pre_2.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19_pre_2.content: Throughout the investment process, I have demonstrated trustworthiness and pro-sociality by proposing a fair allocation plan that benefits both myself and the investor. I successfully managed the investment and ensured accurate profit distribution, reflecting my competence and adherence to norms. My previous reputation aligns with this positive behavior, as I have consistently acted in the best interest of my investors.

Trustee_19_pre_6.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19_pre_6.content: During this investment process, I demonstrated high levels of trustworthiness and pro-sociality by ensuring a fair profit allocation plan that greatly favored the investor, providing them 70% of the profits. My commitment to transparent communication and ethical behavior has reinforced my reputation as a reliable trustee. Coupled with my previous record of successfully managing investments and distributing profits accurately, my updated reputation reflects my dedication to the interests of my investors and adherence to social norms.

Trustee_19_pre_8.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19_pre_8.content: Throughout the recent investment process, I have exemplified trustworthiness and integrity, reinforcing my commitment to ethical standards. I proposed a profit-sharing plan that allocated 70% of the profits to the investor, ensuring their interests were prioritized. This transparent and fair approach, coupled with the successful execution of the investment and timely profit distribution, has enhanced my reputation as a competent and reliable trustee. My history of successful transactions further underscores my capability in fostering long-term, mutually beneficial relationships with investors. This updated reputation reflects my strong adherence to social norms and commitment to the betterment of our community.

Investor_19_pre_21.name: Mateo Garcia
Investor_19_pre_21.content: I have demonstrated trustworthiness through transparency and cooperation during the investment process. My commitment to altruistic principles and fair dealings emphasizes my pro-social approach, fostering long-lasting relationships in investment activities. My effort to adhere to the allocation plan while remaining open to dialogue has solidified my reputation as a reliable investor.

Investor_19_pre_22.name: Mateo Garcia
Investor_19_pre_22.content: I have successfully maintained transparency, cooperation, and adherence to the proposed allocation plan throughout the investment process. My commitment to altruistic principles and fair dealings reinforces my status as a reliable investor. My previous behaviors that established trustworthiness have been consistent with this transaction, further solidifying my reputation and underscoring my pro-social approach in fostering positive relationships.

Trustee_19_pre_25.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19_pre_25.content: Throughout the recent investment process, I have demonstrated commitment to ethical standards and transparency, which has solidified my reputation as a trustworthy and principled trustee. By prioritizing the interests of the investor with a generous profit-sharing plan that allocated 70% of the profits to them, I have reinforced my reliability and competency in managing investments. My successful execution of the investment and timely profit distribution further emphasize my dedication to fostering long-term and mutually beneficial relationships with investors. Additionally, my growing acceptance rate from investors indicates an upward trend in my reputation within the community.
